description: This file defines a controller class for managing a list of SampleItem objects in a Flutter application. It handles initialization, refreshing data, adding, deleting, and clearing items, and provides state notification for UI updates.

classes.name: SampleListController
classes.description: Controller managing a list of SampleItem objects with CRUD operations and state notifications.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initial load of items by calling refresh.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Reloads items from the repository and updates loading state.

methods.name: addItem
methods.description: Adds a new item with the specified title and refreshes the list.

methods.name: deleteItem
methods.description: Deletes an item by ID and updates the current list.

methods.name: clearAll
methods.description: Clears all items from the repository and refreshes the list.
